TopicTitle: [20.2] EVA Followers 0.12 (Open to a Good Home)

Articles.Content: I would like to inform you that your mod conflicts with this mod. Universe Replacer does not load the textures.
I can't get the mod to load in my no-mod version (21.1)... Can't see any conflict, but will look into it.

Seems your right: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/45107-KSPAddon-bug-causes-mod-incompatibilities

Quickfix: Download

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ArMBpTpUHVg



Update: Download

Played with kethane and universe replacer installed.
Awesome! Thanks
so, it is compatible with universe replacer? AWESOMENESS!
awesome mod been using it for a while keep up the awesome work
Im really not used having no debugger around to set breakpoints... It sucks

just wondering because no one has posted anything here in a while but is it possible to use EVA followers to allow rovers to follow kerbals on EVA (not ships or planes just rovers) because i think it would be awesome
it still works in 0.22?

it still works in 0.22?

Well, for myself, I've NEVER been able to get this to work, going back to 0.20.2, so why should 0.22 be any different? And yes, that's a rhetorical question, I've already tried it in 0.22, it still doesn't work for me.
i managed to get it to work on 0.22 but also has this been abandoned?
I belive he abandoned it and is looking for someone to take up development- someone please revive this!
